author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
There has been quite a bit of movement in the X11 space and one such movement is the creation of a new X11 server going by the name Phoenix and written in the Zig language. It's not trying to just be Xorg, it wants to be a modern server and learn from Wayland
